projects.title: YouTube
projects.description: This is my YouTube Channel to which I upload daily. The video consist of clips taken from the Livestream, which in which I mainly play Rainbow Six: Siege. Occasionally I venture out and do something new like Minecraft or Lego Build videos.

projects.title: Twitch
projects.description: This is my Twitch Channel to which I Livestream Daily from my house in Canada. I usually start streaming at 4PM EST Daily. I mostly play Rainbow Six: Siege, but I do venture out and try out whatever game catches my facncy.

projects.title: TeeSpring Merchandise
projects.description: Hop-on over to my TeeSpring page and pick up some VaristyGaming branded merchandise to help support me.
